title: Do I have any hope of getting PES EC campus CSE which 4k rank through KCET within first round of counselling?
content:
I don't think I can get it through first round atleast acc to last yr.  
I have already taken admission through PESSAT for it, it'll probably be converted to KCET if I get it through second round (which is most probable)...So, what if, after the first round of KCET counselling, I decide to join another college (if I assume I won't get in 2nd round as well), then would the fees (except 10k) be refunded?  
  
Just want to clarify. I'm confused about the procedure.

comments.body: Check your dms I've sent you the cutoffs of last year

I was in the same position...i put pes rr then pes ecc as my priority in the kcet counseling...after which i put other colleges...
And i waited till extended cet round...which is after 3rd round and got in...
I did take a calculated risk based on the cut offs from previous years
K, thanks. So, you had decided not to try for any other colleges at all?
